reviewText: I'm not paying $32.68 for a movie that's stupid and also that it's not in English, it stupid that there's not a English version, one that's cheaper
I did not  order this movie.  since I had returned this movie, because it did not work.  I will  not  reorder this again.  Please comfirm I am receiving credit.  on my charge.
Wish we could see this movie here! Billy Burke is an Amazing Actor and it looks like he's Great in this too :) Film looks Really Good!

The Amazon review, written in Italian, should be a clue. There is an English version of this movie out there, but this is not it. It is in Italian only and there are NO other language options and NO subtitle choices.  ITALIAN ONLY.
The DVD came from Italy and cannot be played on my DVD player and it is all in Italian anyway so i was very disappointed when it arrived, especially after paying the shipping on it.

I was going to buy this movie, but it's been on TV many times and it did move slow in the beginning and you didn't know who was the bad guy and who was the good guy, but the last 15 minutes certainly let you know.  It just didn't entertain.

I bought this movie mostly for the flying scenes in the last part of the movie. As with some of
the other movies,it wasn't released on a DVD in the USA yet so did the best I could and bought
it out of Italy. The store did a wonderful job of packing and shipping. Took about 1 month to get
it on economy shipping.

Can't review this video since it won't play in DVD players in the US...Why would it be like that why would it not be compatible with US electronics??  It is not that I hate it but had to put in a rating..
